Detailed Description

Defines the structure pointed to by the kernel GS_BASE.

Every CPU has one of these.

Definition at line 261 of file kernel.h.

The root of the page table in use on the CPU.

Definition at line 263 of file kernel.h.

int CPU_private::thread_index

Index into thread_table of the thread executing on the CPU.

The idle thread has index -1.

Definition at line 267 of file kernel.h.

Referenced by initialize(), and keyboard_interrupt_handler().

int CPU_private::ticks_left_of_time_slice

Can be used by a preemptive scheduler.
